localizedText.DESC_HOST: A hostname, a domain name or an IP address. IPv6 is currently not supported.
localizedText.DESC_PORT: The most common ports are 636 for TLS and 389 for unencrypted connections.
localizedText.DESC_USE_TLS: Strongly recommended, especially when using the 'Simple' authentication mechanism.
localizedText.DESC_TIMEOUT: This timeout is used for all LDAP requests, including search requests.
localizedText.DESC_GROUP_MAPPINGS: Set HMI user groups based on an LDAP user's attributes.
localizedText.DESC_AUTHENTICATION_MECHANISM: The most common mechanism is 'Simple'. 'Digest-MD5' is recommended when TLS is unavailable.
localizedText.DESC_USERNAME_ATTRIBUTE: Attribute used to identify the user.
localizedText.IGNORE_DOMAIN_SUFFIX_DURING_LOGIN: Ignore the domain suffix during login
localizedText.DESC_IGNORE_DOMAIN_SUFFIX_DURING_LOGIN: Ignore everything after the first @ in the username submitted by the user. If you are for example using 'userPrincipalName' on ActiveDirectory you need to disable this setting, because the userPrincipalName contains an @.
localizedText.DESC_APPEND_DOMAIN_DURING_LOGIN: For example, if the 'email' or 'userPrincipalName' is used for login, this setting can be used to automatically add the domain suffix so that it does not need to be specified at login. The extension does a case-insensitive check to find out if the domain suffix is already present.
localizedText.DESC_BASE_DN: Entry point for LDAP search requests. If empty, the domain components of the host are used.
localizedText.DESC_USER_FILTER: Used to search for the user entry. {input} is a placeholder replaced by what the user inputs in the login form. {username_attribute} is a placeholder replaced by the configured username attribute.
localizedText.DESC_BIND_USER_DN: The full DN of the admin user that is used to search for the DN of the user that is trying to sign in. This setting is ignored if the authentication mechanism is 'Anonymous', 'Kerberos-Credential-Cache' or 'None'.
localizedText.DESC_BIND_USER_PASSWORD: Encrypted before it is stored in the configuration database. Decrypted during a configuration export.
localizedText.DESC_BIND_USER_AUTHENTICATION_MECHANISM: 'None' means that there is no bind user, in which case, the bind request is done with what the user inputs in the login form.
localizedText.DESC_USE_LDAP_SEARCH_FOR_LISTUSERS: Depending on the size of the directory, the search might take too long or return too many results. If disabled, the usernames are collected from the TcHmiSrv configuration.
localizedText.DESC_CASE_SENSITIVE_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_COMP: DNs and attributes are case-insensitive by default. It is possible to define an attribute as case-sensitive in the schema, but this is rare.
localizedText.MSG_SEARCH_FAILED: Search request with filter '{2}' and base DN '{1}' failed after {0}: {3}
localizedText.MSG_SEARCH_SUCCEEDED: Search request with filter '{2}' and base DN '{1}' succeeded after {0}
localizedText.MSG_CONNECT_FAILED: Connection to {0}:{1} could not be established: {2}
localizedText.MSG_MISSING_USER_ATTRIBUTE: Missing attribute '{0}' in the directory entry '{1}' of user '{2}'
localizedText.MSG_MISSING_USER_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE: Missing value '{3}' for attribute '{0}' in the directory entry '{1}' of user '{2}'
localizedText.MSG_UNEXPECTED_SEARCH_RESULTS_COUNT: Expected search request with filter '{2}' and base DN '{1}' to return {3} entries but got {4} entries. Currently authenticated with user: '{0}'
localizedText.DESC_LDAP_OPT_REFERRALS: Specifies whether to automatically follow referrals returned by the LDAP server.
localizedText.DESC_TRUST_ALL_CERTIFICATES: If 'false', check whether the server certificate was issued by a certificate authority trusted by the operating system.
localizedText.DESC_BLOCK_USERS: Blocked users are not able to log in, even if they logged in successfully in the past.
localizedText.WHITELIST_ACCOUNTS_AFFECTED_BY_GROUP_MAP: Whitelist accounts affected by group mappings
localizedText.DESC_WHITELIST_ACCOUNTS_AFFECTED_BY_GROU: Treat every group mapping as whitelist entry.
localizedText.DESC_ADDED_GROUPS_CACHE: This cache is needed to correctly remove user group memberships that were configured based on group mappings.
localizedText.hostIsIpAddressAndBaseDnIsNotSet: A base DN should be configured when using an IP address as a host.
localizedText.noAuthenticationMechanismForBindUser: The configured bind user will be ignored because no authentication mechanism was specified.
localizedText.noWhitelistedUsers: Authentication is blocked for all users.
